H6989.def: = woman; ◄ concubine of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>}; ► mother of {L:Zimran<SDBH:זִמְרָן>}, {L:Jokshan<SDBH:יָקְשָׁן>}, {L:Medan<SDBH:מְדָן>}, {L:Midian<SDBH:מִדְיָן>}, {L:Ishbak<SDBH:יִשְׁבָּק>}, and {L:Shuah<SDBH:שׁוּחַ>}

H85.def: = man, also known as {L:Abram<SDBH:אַבְרָם>}; ◄ son of {L:Terah<SDBH:תֶּרַח>}; ► first patriarch of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>} and {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3327.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Abraham<SDBH:אַבְרָהָם>} and {L:Sarah<SDBH:שָׂרָה>}; ► one of the patriarchs of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; father of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>} and {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}

H6215.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and older brother of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6215.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and older brother of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H8487.def: = area located to the south of a point of reference

H7073.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Eliphaz<SDBH:אֱלִיפַז>}, firstborn son of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}

H6002.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Eliphaz<SDBH:אֱלִיפַז>}; grandson of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}; ► chief of {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H5184.def: = action by which humans move down from a place of higher elevation

H2226.def: = process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well-being

H8048.def: = state in which an area has become empty as a result of destruction and depopulation

H8165.def: = man; ► regarded as founder of an ethnic group bearing the same name, and living in an area named after him as well

H3877.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Seir<SDBH:שֵׂעִיר>}; ► chief of {L:Horites<SDBH:חֹרִי>}; father of {L:Hori<SDBH:חֹרִי>} and {L:Homam<SDBH:הֹומָם>} (also called {L:Hemam<SDBH:הֵימָם>})

H6649.def: = man; ◄ {L:Hivite<SDBH:חִוִּי>}; ► father of {L:Anah<SDBH:עֲנָה>} and grandfather of {L:Oholibamah<SDBH:אָהֳלִיבָמָה>}, one of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}'s {L:Canaanite<SDBH:כְּנַעֲנִי>} wives

H1787.def: = deerlike ruminant mammal of the Kobus family, of which the male grows two horns; feeds on plants; ◄ |iAddax nasomaculatus, Kobus|i*; ► clean animal which may be eaten

H3877.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Seir<SDBH:שֵׂעִיר>}; ► chief of {L:Horites<SDBH:חֹרִי>}; father of {L:Hori<SDBH:חֹרִי>} and {L:Homam<SDBH:הֹומָם>} (also called {L:Hemam<SDBH:הֵימָם>})

H2753.def: exact meaning unsure; probably: = bread; ◄ baked from white flour; ► used as food

H1950.def: = man, also called {L:Hemam<SDBH:הֵימָם>} or {L:Heman<SDBH:הֵימָן>}; ◄ son of {L:Lotan<SDBH:לֹוטָן>}; descendant of {L:Seir<SDBH:שֵׂעִיר>}

H269.def: = daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H345.def: = bird of prey of a relatively small size, that can fly fast, but also hover; lives on rats, mice, and other birds; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten

= woman; ◄ daughter of {L:Zibeon<SDBH:צִבְעֹון>}; mother of {L:Oholibamah<SDBH:אָהֳלִיבָמָה>}, wife of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4427.def: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H123.def: = man; usually referred to as {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; brother of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; ► ancestor of the {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H4191.def: = process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

H2226.def: = process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well-being
